verses.roman:
prasaṅge kahila ei siddhāntera sāra
ihā yei śune, śuddha-bhakti haya tāra

synonyms: prasaṅge—in the course of discussion; kahila—it was said; ei—this; siddhāntera—of the conclusion; sāra—the essence; ihā—this; yei—anyone who; śune—hears; śuddha-bhakti—unalloyed devotional service; haya—becomes; tāra—his.
translation: In this discourse I have explained the essence of the devotional conclusion. Anyone who hears this develops unalloyed devotional service to the Lord.
